channel.title: Holy Divinity | 718 | #1 PvM |
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i612.photobucket.com/albums/tt208/AdminAngel/Holydivinity.png[/img] [img]http://icons.iconarchive.com/icons/fixicon/samurai/48/Location-HTTP-icon.png[/img] - [URL=http://"http://holy-divinity.eu"]Link[/URL][/center]
[CENTER]What makes Holy Divinity different from other Servers? Holy Divinity is a server like nothing else. It's based on PvM, Skilling and Economy. We have all skills working including dungeoneering like on rs! We want to provide you with a friendly and fun community. [/CENTER]
[CENTER]This is a small list of things we have:
[ul][*]Updated (almost) daily [*]Costum coding [*]ClanChat [*]FriendsChat [*]Dungeoneering like real RS [*]Summoning [*]Great economy. [*]Many bosses (including QBD, Nomad, Party Demon & more) [*]All skills working [*]All special attacks. [*]24/7 Uptime [*]Trading [*]Webclient & Desktopclient [*]AutoCasting [*]100% working Private Messaging [*]Active helpful staff [*]Regular updates! [*]Completely Lag Free! [*]100% working leeches [*]Runescape like Combat [*]Redone accuracy to be like runescape [*]Multi Barrages [*]Working weapon specs and effects [*]Working curses prayer book, including turmoil! [*]All spell books, Moderns, Ancients and Lunars [*]All Spirit shields working, Even their affects. [*]Working Teleblock [*]Staff of light Special [*]Yell with custom tags [*]Daily Events![/ul]
Like what you've read? come and check us out on [img]http://icons.iconarchive.com/icons/fixicon/samurai/48/Location-HTTP-icon.png[/img] - [URL=http://"http://holy-divinity.eu"]Holy Divinity[/URL][/center]

[CENTER]What makes Holy Divinity different from other Servers?
Holy Divinity is a server like nothing else. It’s based on PvM, Skilling and Economy. We have all skills working including dungeoneering like on rs! We want to provide you with a friendly and fun community.
[/CENTER]

[CENTER]This is a small list of things we have:

[ul][]Updated (almost) daily
[]Costum coding
[]ClanChat
[]FriendsChat
[]Dungeoneering like real RS
[]Summoning
[]Great economy.
[]Many bosses (including QBD, Nomad, Party Demon & more)
[]All skills working
[]All special attacks.
[]24/7 Uptime
[]Trading

[]AutoCasting
[]100% working Private Messaging
[]Active helpful staff
[]Regular updates!
[]Completely Lag Free!
[]100% working leeches

[]Redone accuracy to be like runescape
[]Multi Barrages
[]Working weapon specs and effects
[]Working curses prayer book, including turmoil!
[]All spell books, Moderns, Ancients and Lunars
[]All Spirit shields working, Even their affects.
